column1: This year has been challenging for everyone but there’s still so much to be grateful for. I hope everyone has a happy and safe Thanksgiving! https://t.co/SAEKtheObC

It’s an honor to be on a thank you call with President-elect Joe Biden. I look forward to seeing what a Biden-Harris administration will accomplish. As well as working with them on ways to better serve our South Texas communities. https://t.co/FcYfSXiuFN

Congratulations President-elect @JoeBiden and Vice President-elect @KamalaHarris on this historic moment. As our country transitions into this new chapter I look forward to you and your administration working to unite Americans and continue healing the soul of our nation.

We are all Americans. Together we will move this country forward in pursuit of a brighter future.  Once again thank you District 28 for standing by my side.  It’s an honor of a lifetime to serve you. (2/2)

Thank you to everyone who participated in this election. Whether you voted block walked or phone banked you made your voice heard and made a difference. Whether you’re a Democrat or Republican just know that I will fight for you because above it all: you are American. (1/2)

Thank you for the support Hokkaido Sushi! Team Cuellar can’t wait to dig in.  We’ve got a little over an hour left before polls close. Let‘s keep pushing until the very end! #ElectionDay https://t.co/izXE2BE6nG
STAY IN LINE. YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO VOTE.  We can win this. We can flip TX blue. We can elect @JoeBiden. Stay in line cast your vote use your voice. https://t.co/YCdRHbDayn

We’re out and about visiting poll sites and ran into Ranchers for Henry Cuellar. Thank you Zapata County Commissioner Olga Elizondo and Raymond Bruni for your continued support and commitment to bettering our community. We’re almost to the finish line TX-28; let’s win this! https://t.co/3M66XuWjpM

What’s better than reaching out to voters today?   Reaching out to voters while enjoying @whataburger for lunch.   Let’s go Texas! We’ve got a few more hours to make our voices heard. https://t.co/mqPCMPmXNG

Votantes Texanos si usted o alguien que conoce enfrenta barreras de idioma tiene una discapacidad no puede ingresar al lugar de votación y necesita acceso al servicio en la acera o necesita más ayuda llame al 844-TX-VOTES.

Texas voters if you or anyone you know faces language barriers has a disability is unable to enter the polling place and needs access to curbside service or requires any further assistance please call 844-TX-VOTES.

You can feel the excitement on #ElectionDay! We’re less than 24 hours from keeping TX-28 blue but I need your help to finish this out strong. Your vote = your voice.   Let’s win this. https://t.co/O3xm5yebfN
Go vote and let’s win this! Polls are open until 7pm. https://t.co/ib3I9saORv

🚨 Polls are open! Remember as long as you’re in line by 7pm tonight you have the right to vote. Check out the link below to make sure you have everything you need or call 844-TX-VOTES for more info.   https://t.co/Fgy6tq2CM5

Tomorrow is the big day! I’m hoping I can count on your vote as we cross the finish line. Find your polling place today and get ready to take part in one of the most crucial elections of our lifetime.  https://t.co/hMxw2VN2PO

The Chairman of the Democratic National Committee @TomPerez fired up canvassers and phone bankers in Webb County today! The work that these men & women are doing is crucial for Democratic candidates up & down the ballot. This Tuesday make your voice heard and your vote count. https://t.co/5eTfuuCbtn
What’s scarier?  Team Cuellar’s Halloween costumes OR the thought of not casting your vote on Nov. 3rd?  Make a plan. Cast your vote. Flip Texas blue. https://t.co/DPqY71VoaX

Democrats across the state and nation are fighting for your right to healthcare quality education and more. Thank you Senator Harris for making it clear: in 3 days we have the chance to put a stop to 4 more years of President Trump.   Go vote on Nov. 3rd. https://t.co/4tBjuNCLPA

South Texas showed up yesterday in support of Senator @KamalaHarris. We have 3 days left to make a voting plan for ourselves our family members and our friends. You can make the difference this election because this race is about you! https://t.co/ZQZxHN79NY

Started the morning off early with the Webb County Democratic Party to welcome the Biden/Harris bus to Laredo. TODAY is the last day to vote early in Texas. Make your voice heard and let’s win this! https://t.co/RPZGnQkpzQ

You have until FRIDAY to vote early! I’m with the Biden campaign Mark Cuban Maya Harris Daniel Lubetzky & Rufus Gifford to discuss how we can mobilize our business owners & communities in order to get out the vote. The choice is clear this election - that choice is Democrats. https://t.co/orc4VlaJyc

It’s an honor to have their endorsements and I remain committed to enhancing transparency promoting accountability and advancing public safety in order to improve relationships between officers and their communities.
I have always worked to ensure that federal resources and funding are made available to the men and women who bravely protect our neighborhoods.  https://t.co/dtVsJz4vGF

Everyone is ready to turn Texas blue including some of my favorite actors. Earlier I joined a fundraiser with fellow Texas Democrats and a few of Hollywood’s biggest stars to discuss the importance of getting out the vote - now until Nov. 3rd. https://t.co/PrHd7vx3oM
🚨 Today is the last day to request a mail in ballot in Texas! If you qualify to vote by mail visit https://t.co/inaSzSGT6V.

Webb County we need you to cast your vote this November! The future of our democracy depends on it. Join the @NoBorderWallLTX Coalition for an exciting virtual concert to unite the border and get out the vote. For more info: https://t.co/c1x1jt1REs

Starting my morning off with a good ole’ cup of Joe! America deserves a president who demonstrates leadership and compassion. With the Biden Blend we can count on Vice-President Joe Biden and Senator Kamala Harris to unite our country not divide it. https://t.co/PEdzmIB9Yr
Not only is he a proud Democrat - but first and foremost - he’s an American. In Congress he’ll continue to work for you regardless of your party affiliation.
Kike Coronado knows that Congressman Henry Cuellar fights for all South Texans. By bringing better paying jobs to his district Rep. Cuellar puts working families first. https://t.co/RReh1dxGB5
If you qualify to vote by mail Friday Oct. 23rd is the last day to request a ballot. Visit https://t.co/vSHfUY6RZN and submit your request before it’s too late!
Congressman Cuellar will always fight for South Texas families and work to ensure that everyone has the necessary resources to be successful.

Nelly Salazar chooses to support Congressman Henry Cuellar this election because she knows that he understands the constituents of TX-28. This district is his home. He was raised here he’s gone to school here and he’s raised his own family here. https://t.co/zYHw5a6YNU
I’m out in Zapata today for a Biden-Harris parade. If you haven’t casted your vote this weekend is a great time to do so! Vote early and vote Democrats. #TurnTexasBlue https://t.co/KzY3uCQ0Nh
I voted! Have you?   You have until Oct. 30th to cast your vote early or on Election Day Nov. 3rd. https://t.co/JzBY1okfWQ

This is a disservice to our nation. Cutting the Census short hurts our communities and our most vulnerable populations.   Fill out the #2020census now. We’re running out of time. https://t.co/hD03jwaTXU

Thank you for the endorsement @lmtnews. I’m proud to be from this city & will always fight for the best interest of our community as well as all of TX28. South Texans know what’s best for South Texas - this includes access to health care a quality education & better paying jobs https://t.co/UvNZCtUS1D
🚨 Early voting starts TODAY! You have until Oct. 30th to cast your vote early in one of the most important elections of our lifetime. Find your polling place at https://t.co/fOOqHaRwxx.

Team Cuellar closed out the last three days strong by making vote plans w/ residents across the district. Help us reach our goal of contacting +64000 voters by volunteering to phone bank or text! Those interested can send a DM or sign up at https://t.co/bb9HKr1PU7 https://t.co/R8P4qP21Qu

Abel is a Webb County resident looking to pursue higher education. He’s planning to support Henry Cuellar this November because of the congressman’s work in strengthening financial aid resources for student’s across Texas. #HCandMe https://t.co/hAi2rLpvjk
We’re days away from the start of Early Voting! Don’t forget these important dates as we get closer to Election Day. https://t.co/ARTipfR85F
Team Cuellar was hard at work tonight reaching out to voters! Join one of our phone banks by signing up to volunteer through my website: https://t.co/1e9GtzqfL4 https://t.co/SYlg0n3ySt

The Administration postponing relief talks is a complete disregard for the American public. Our country needs immediate action to save lives & livelihoods. With more than 210000 dead & over 7.5 million infected we must put politics aside.  https://t.co/kr4vS1NUy6

Over the weekend I attended the Ridin' with Biden car parade in Laredo. Thank you to Webb County Democrats for safely bringing us together to support Democrats down the ballot. If we want to move our state and our country forward we need to put this car in D and vote Democrats. https://t.co/90fCt6yWG4
🇺🇸 It’s the LAST DAY to register to VOTE! If you haven’t done so register before it’s too late.   Your voice matters. Your vote counts. https://t.co/vSHfUY6RZN
My prayers go out to the President and the First Lady as well as every American battling the coronavirus.  https://t.co/gGIy2BnRXn

🇺🇸 REGISTER TO VOTE BY OCT. 5 🇺🇸 REGISTER TO VOTE BY OCT. 5 🇺🇸 REGISTER TO VOTE BY OCT. 5  Don’t miss out on participating in the most important election of our lifetime. Register today: https://t.co/hMxw2VN2PO

Las familias del sur de Texas merecen un congresista que luche por ellos en los asuntos más importantes.  Esto significa atención médica accesible ayuda financiera para estudiantes universitarios fortalecimiento de el seguro social y reducción de impuestos. https://t.co/eoJFNv00l8
🙋‍♂️Retweet if you paid more in taxes than President Trump.   https://t.co/LWFhbpuqVB

This election isn’t just a choice between parties or personalities; it’s a choice between philosophies. This year the choice couldn’t be clearer - Democrats are fighting for a better future. One that we can all benefit from.   Early Voting: Oct. 13-30  Election Day: Nov. 3 https://t.co/mSTqCGNenQ

Earlier I was able to pay my respects to Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg as she was lying in repose at the Supreme Court.  Thank you Justice Ginsburg for your contributions to society. https://t.co/k6YXp0H2tn
During #SmallBusinessWeek it's more important than ever to support the hardworking entrepreneurs who are vital in fueling our economy.

As a small business owner myself I know what it’s like to build something from the ground up. That’s why I fight to protect local small businesses that help create the fabric to our communities and strengthen our workforce. https://t.co/emKAyzLF7A

Why is it that in 2016 the idea of filling a vacant SCOTUS seat was unfathomable to Republican Senators. Now they’re rushing the process? Voting is already underway in some states. Let the American people have a say in who our next justice is. https://t.co/4IrWV91Bjl
It’s #NationalVoterRegistrationDay! Make sure you’re ready by:  ➡️ Registering to vote ➡️ Get your family & friends to register ➡️ Make a voting plan https://t.co/JGTA19xBRt

It isn’t just a name on the ballot this November. A vote for Democrats is a vote for:  🚑 Access to quality health care 💊 Lower prescription drug prices 💵 Ensuring taxes are spent responsibly & benefit taxpayers ✏️ Supporting public schools 👴🏼👵🏼 Strengthening Social Security

Ruth Bader Ginsburg was an icon and true American hero. Justice Ginsburg pushed our nation forward through the rule of law. I send my deepest condolences to her loved-ones.  May she Rest In Peace.  https://t.co/pQfFESauMn

Today as we begin to celebrate Hispanic Heritage Month let's use this time to ensure that our Hispanic communities are not forgotten. I am fully committed in the fight to fix America's broken immigration system as well as ensuring that we protect our nation's Dreamers. #HHM https://t.co/sIUGBgP2js
Are you all set for November 3rd? The updates to https://t.co/inaSzSGT6V make it easier than ever to: 🗓️ Find important dates and deadlines 📝 Check your registration ✉️ Request a mail-in ballot

This shouldn’t be a partisan issue - we must protect women from domestic violence & abuse. https://t.co/Yr8rWFnVFy

Atascosa Health Center serves six counties including Atascosa McMullen and Wilson. These funds will improve efficiency in their delivery and quality of care especially as we continue to address COVID-19.

This pandemic has reiterated how important it is to have access to quality health care. I’m committed to helping health centers throughout our district strengthen their resources & provide essential services to the public.  https://t.co/YsFExEG0Tz

19 years ago our nation was changed forever as we witnessed an act of terrorism that took the lives of innocent people. Today we remember both the lives lost and the remarkable heroes & first responders who answered the call in helping their fellow Americans. #NeverForget https://t.co/mOhVeA34WG

COVID-19 has devastated our communities along the southern border and we must find a way to minimize public health risks while still allowing for our small businesses to resume economic operations. https://t.co/SrtYTDKfoT

He knew it was airborne.  He knew it was deadly.  He let the American people suffer.   The president and his administration failed to do their job. Now our local communities and economies must try to withstand the devastating impacts due to their negligence. https://t.co/q2Dv96t0gC

On this Labor Day I want to give a special thanks to all the essential workers who are working tirelessly to help our nation get through this unprecedented health pandemic. Thank you for your continued efforts during these difficult times. https://t.co/kLCLQKFcet

My parents raised me with a passion for education which has influenced my life to this day. I have always fought for quality and affordable education. (1/3) https://t.co/SBclYsxHmT
